cab.content: Printed for the Cabinet. April 1954SECRET Copy No. 4 2f c.C.(54) CABINET OFFICE25th Conclusions RECORD copy cabinet conclusions of a Meeting of the Cabinet held at 10, Downing Street, S.W, 1,on Monday, 5th April, 1954. at 12 noon present:The Right Hon. Sir Winston Churchill, M.P., Prime Minister.The Right Hon. Anthony Eden, M.P.,Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs.The Right Hon.Chancellor.Lord Simonds, lord the Right Hon. R. A. Butler, M.P.,Chancellor of the Exchequer.The Right Hon. H. F. C. Crookshank,M.P., Lord Privy Seal.The Right Hon. Viscount Swinton,Secretary of State for commonwealth relations.The Right Hon. James Stuart, M.P.,Secretary of State for Scotland.The Right Hon. Harold Macmillan,M.P., Minister of Housing and LocalGovernment.The Right Hon. Sir Thomas Dugdale,M.P., Minister of Agriculture andFisheries.The Right Hon.The Most Hon. the Marquess of salisbury, Lord President of theCouncil.The Right Hon. Sir David maxwell fyfe, Q.C., M.P., Secretary of Statefor the Home Department and minister for Welsh Affairs.The Right Hon. Viscount Woolton,Chancellor of the Duchy of lancaster and Minister of Materials.The Right Hon. the Earl Alexander of tunis, Minister of Defence.The Right Hon. Oliver Lyttelton,M.P., Secretary of State for theColonies.The Right Hon. Sir Walter Monckton,Q.C., M.P., Minister of Labour and national Service.The Right Hon. Peter Thorneycroft,M.P., President of the Board of Trade.The Right Hon. Florence Horsbrugh,M.P., Minister of Education.GW1LYM LLOYD-George, M.P., Minister of Food.The following were also present:The Right Hon. Osbert Peake, M.P.,Minister of Pensions and national insurance.The Right Hon. Patrick Buchan-Hepburn, M.P., parliamentary secretary, Treasury.secretary the Right Hon. Sir Norman Brook.46035-1ContentsThe Budget The Budget. The Chancellor of the Exchequer communicated to the cabinet particulars of the proposals in the forthcoming Budget.In accordance with precedent, details are not recorded in theCabinet Conclusions.Cabinet Office, S.W. 1,5th April, 1954.
